name: Buffet Battle (FoodJam)
description:
You were trapped in the cursed buffet from the outer world with a bunch of evil food. These hamburgers and ice creams were raised from the dead to kill you (make you bigger, actually). Your only way to the freedom lies through the magic book which dispels all the enemies and open the door outside.

Gather all keys and fight evil pizza to escape from this madness!


   This project contains the prototype of the core mechanic (no winning conditions, sorry), 2D/3D assets , character models, UI, few sound chunks, music theme and design documents. Fill free to check them and leave your feedback in the comments below.

All materials were created during #FoodJam  which was hosted on itch.io (3-5 Aug'18)

Participants: 

Olexandr Davydov - programming
Serhii Todosan - game design, technical writing
Taras Kovtun - 3D Art, game design
Vitalii Zavoloka - project coordinator, programming
Victoria Liashuk - 2D Art
